channel.title: How Do i change Amount of kills for an item. (HELP PLEASE)
channel.description:
hello i have a pvp server and when players try to spawn barrow gloves or rune defender it says they need 35 kills to unlock it. How can i change the amount of kills to 0?
This is a 508 server, just to let u know.
